Scans and research show 
that even in the womb, 
babies yawn, suck their 
thumbs and respond to 
familiar voices and music, 
perhaps even the theme tune 
to your favourite TV soap!
Many partners like to get 
involved at this stage too. 
Have you thought about who 
your baby might look like?
Looking after yourself
